name: Hologram
description:
Restore the timeline, save the city of Holon and discover the truth about the hologram, in a race against time, in this war for freedom.

You are the one. The time is coming. The world is changing. The future of humanity is in danger. The evil horde has risen, and they won’t stop coming killing. But, there´s always hope. You are the only one with power enough to stop them. You´re the hero. Lead the ultimate combat to save humanity from these terrible enemies. The time has come for leader Woner to regain his freedom.

Play as Woner and meet the complete cast, filled with the game's complex and immersive characters, all with the most diverse motivations. Enjoy the cinematic action scenes and the fast-paced gameplay of the HOLOGRAM game.

Join the Hologram war.

FEATURES


  • Time-manipulation abilities: Activate the bullet-time on the battlefield and dodge incoming fire while battling Hors and Zkruls.

  • Jetpack system: Fly over the battlefields and avoid mass attacks.

  • Teleport: Use the Gateway to teleport from one location to another within the level.
